name: Tara Ellis
seeking: Seeks JV partners who can refer or co-market to general business audiences needing professional services or business development support. Limited data suggests openness to cross-referral arrangements with professionals in complementary service areas.
what_you_do: Amazon best-selling author of sci-fi, mystery, and children's detective novels, and keynote speaker on topics of authorship, education, and literacy.
business_focus: Full-time author of sci-fi and mystery novels with a focus on children's and young adult literature, and public speaking on related topics.
who_you_serve: Readers of sci-fi, mystery, and middle-grade children's books, as well as event organizers seeking speakers on authorship, education, and literacy.
offering: Keynote speaking engagements on authorship, education, and literacy; published book series across multiple genres.
bio: Tara Ellis is an Amazon best-selling author living in a small, rural town in Washington State. She was a firefighter/EMT and worked in the medical field for many years before committing to writing full-time. She writes post-apocalyptic sci-fi, YA alternate history, and a popular middle-grade mystery series, The Samantha Wolf Mysteries.
service_provided: Keynote speaking, author appearances, virtual speaking engagements
signature_programs: Flashpoint series, Extinction series, After the Crash series, Forgotten Origins trilogy, The Samantha Wolf Mysteries series
